posts.text:
Snilldar vél í jepppann, snertiskjár. Notar puttanna eða penna. 
Verð: 90.000
Ný vél kostar 2.200 USD.
Kemur með Windows 8 og nRoute uppsett. 
CPU: Intel Core i7-640 LM
RAM: 4.0 GB DDR3 SODIMM (x1)
Display: 12.1" WXGA (1280x800) AFFS+ LED
Input: Active Digitizer + Capacitive Touch 
Battery: 1,880mAh Lithium-Ion (x2)
Wireless: Intel Centrino 6205 WiFi a/b/g/n Bluetooth 2.1+EDR
Other: 10/100/1000 Ethernet LAN eSATA+USB 2.0, Digitizer Stylus.
Framleiðandinn.
http://www.tabletkiosk.com/products/sah ... p#hardware
